name: COSMIC CLASH
description:
THEME :
A long time ago, it was the time where Angle and Demos fight each other for supremacy over the cosmos. As a result whole universe falls into chaos. Now the gates of heaven are being attacked by demons! It's your duty to stop the invasion. Destroy the enemy squadrons to ultimately destroy the portal to close off reinforcements. But be careful to avoid the demon war chief's mischievous grasp and make sure no planets break through the divine gate !!

CONTROLS :
-->Keyboard (A / Left arrow) to move Left and  (D / Right Arrow) to move Right.
-->Mouse Drag to control shooting direction.
